abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev said Wednesday that it would sell its theme parks, including the three SeaWorlds and two Busch Gardens across the country, to the Blackstone Group for as much as $2.7 billion.
snippet: Anheuser-Busch InBev said Wednesday that it would sell its theme parks, including the three SeaWorlds and two Busch Gardens across the country, to the Blackstone Group for as much as $2.7 billion.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch InBev said Wednesday that it would sell its theme parks, including the three SeaWorlds and two Busch Gardens across the country, to the Blackstone Group for as much as $2.7 billion.

headline.main: Blackstone to Buy Busch Theme Parks
